introduction.bio: Full-stack engineer with over 10 years of experience leading front-end work in React and Next.js. I combine design sensitivity with TypeScript, Node, and Python to create fast, scalable, pixel-perfect web applications while guiding cross-functional teams toward clean code and enjoyable user experiences.
introduction.services: I assist brands, companies, institutions, and startups in creating exceptional digital experiences for their businesses through strategic development services.
introduction.openForFreelance: I'm open for freelance projects, feel free to email me to see how can we collaborate.
